description: The abbreviated name for the library
title: Short Name

description: The full name of the library
title: Library Name

description: The number of experimental wells in the library (click link to browse experimental wells)
title: Experimental Well Count

description: The vendor or source that provided the library
title: Provider

description: Solvent used in the library wells
title: Solvent

description: The type of library, e.g., 'Commercial', 'Known Bioactives', 'siRNA', etc.
title: Library Type

description: Whether wells contains pools of reagents or single reagents
title: Is Pool

description: The plate number for the first plate in the library
title: Start Plate

description: The plate number for the last plate in the library
title: End Plate

description: The copies that have been made of this library
title: Copies

description: Screening status for the library, e.g., 'Allowed', 'Not Allowed', 'Not Yet Plated', etc.
title: Screening Status

description: The date the data was received
title: Date Data Received

description: The date the library data was loaded
title: Date Loaded

description: The date the library data was made publicly available
title: Date Publicly Available
